text: Pione Sisto Ifolo Emirmija (; born 4 February 1995) is a Danish professional footballer. He plays as a left winger for Greek club Aris and the Danish national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League Cup Cup Continental Continental Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Midtjylland 2012–13 Danish Superliga 10 0 1 0 – 11 0 2013–14 27 6 2 3 – 29 9 2014–15 22 8 0 0 2 0 24 8 2015–16 29 4 0 0 13 4 42 8 2016–17 2 2 0 0 5 4 7 6 Total 90 20 3 3 20 8 113 31 Celta Vigo 2016–17 La Liga 30 3 6 1 13 2 49 6 2017–18 34 5 2 1 – 36 6 2018–19 25 2 2 0 – 27 2 2019–20 21 2 2 2 – 23 4 Total 110 12 12 4 13 2 135 18 Midtjylland 2020–21 Danish Superliga 12 5 1 0 8 0 21 5 Career total 212 37 16 7 41 10 269 54 ===International=== :Statistics accurate as of match played 18 November 2020.
